name: Madou Monogatari 4
summary:
Announced in October 2023, this new entry in the classic Madou Monogatari series is slated to release in Summer of 2024. Madou Monogatari 4 is being developed by Sting and D4 Cooperation, with cooperation from Sega to include the original Madou Monogatari characters. Very little else is known regarding the game, barring some concept art.

Announced by Compile Heart along with five other upcoming titles.
